definitions.definition: The condition of an organism that is able to reproduce as both male and female, either simultaneously ( simultaneous hermaphroditism or cosexuality ) or sequentially ( sequential hermaphroditism or dichogamy ).
The condition of intersex people with intermediate sex characteristics or pseudohermaphroditism .

main_definition: ( biology ) The condition of an organism that is able to reproduce as both male and female, either simultaneously ( simultaneous hermaphroditism or cosexuality ) or sequentially ( sequential hermaphroditism or dichogamy ).
secondary_definitions: ( dated , historical , now offensive ) The condition of intersex people with intermediate sex characteristics or pseudohermaphroditism .
